trends: There have been 63 other sightings in Abilene
There were no other sightings in Abilene on or around May 30th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside my home, taking out the trash and saw a bright starlike object at 8-10k feet.It first appeared approx 15 miles away in the western sky and passed dirrectly over Dyess Air Force Base, object covered approx 30 miles in about 2 minutes with one course correction heading east southeast. The light went out like a switch was cut off while it was still bright and visable aprox 15 miles downrange. Many aircraft in the area with most traffic at about 30k feet, well above the object.The traffic at 30k was obviously comercial airliners out of DFW headed west to Phoenix and the west coast. Third sighting of this object so far. I have calculated the speed of the object at approx 8-900 miles an hour.Completly silent, no sonic boom and no reaction from Dyess Air Force Base.The most remarkable thing was it passed directly in front of the moon and with the help of my 10x binoculars, I saw the profile for a splt second, it was round like a tennis ball! WEIRD!
